europeana:record.dc:title: Some notes on the associated occurrence of the crab Cycloes Cristata (Brullé, 1837) (Brachyura: Calappidae) and two types of Benthic fish in the Canary Islands
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Hartog, den J.C.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Arthropoda
Cycloes cristata (Brachyura
Calappidae); associated occurrence; fish; Bothus podus; Trachinus ssp
europeana:record.dc:description: A concise survey is presented of the species of the crab genus Cycloes De Haan, 1837 (Brachyura: Calappidae). Notes are presented on the associated ocurrence, on shallow sandy bottoms in the Canary Islands (Lanzarote, Gran Canaria), of the eastern Atlantic Cycloes cristata (Brullé, 1837) and the fishes Bothus podus (De la Roche, 1809) (Bothidae), Trachinus draco L., 1758 and T. cf. araneus Cuvier, 1829 (Trachinidae).
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Some notes on the associated occurrence of the crab Cycloes Cristata (Brullé, 1837) (Brachyura: Calappidae) and two types of Benthic fish in the Canary Islands (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 61) (Issue 33)
